message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/LinearRoad 

<!-- Car --------------------- -->
 	  <conceptmap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/Car" identify-by="car">
		<has-table name="CurActiveCars" />	
		<uri-as encodeURI="false">
			<operation oper-id="concat">
				<arg-restriction>
		 			<has-value>http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/car_<has-value>
				</arg-restriction>
				<arg-restriction>
				    <has-column datatype="int">CurActiveCars.carId</has-column>
				</arg-restriction>
			</operation>
		</uri-as>
		<attributemap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/id">
			<selector>
                           <aftertransform>
                               <operation oper-id="constant">
                                   <arg-restriction on-param="const-val">
                                         <has-column>CurActiveCars.carId</has-column>
                                   </arg-restriction>
                                </operation>
                            </aftertransform>
                         </selector>
                  </attributemap-def>
	 </conceptmap-def>
<!-- Segment --------------------- -->
	<conceptmap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/Segment" identify-by="segment">
		<has-table name="Seg" />
		
		<uri-as encodeURI="false">
			<operation oper-id="concat">
				<arg-restriction>
		 			<has-value>http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/seg_<has-value>
				</arg-restriction>
				<arg-restriction>
				    <has-column datatype="int">Seg.seg</has-column>
				</arg-restriction>
			</operation>
		</uri-as>
		
		<attributemap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/id">
			<selector>
                <aftertransform>
                    <operation oper-id="constant">
                        <arg-restriction on-param="const-val">
                            <has-column>Seg.seg</has-column>
                        </arg-restriction>
                    </operation>
                </aftertransform>
            </selector>
        </attributemap-def>
        
        <attributemap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/avgSpeed">
			<selector>
                <aftertransform>
                    <operation oper-id="constant">
                        <arg-restriction on-param="const-val">
                            <has-column>Seg.speed</has-column>
                        </arg-restriction>
                    </operation>
                </aftertransform>
            </selector>
        </attributemap-def>
        
        <attributemap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/volume">
			<selector>
                <aftertransform>
                    <operation oper-id="constant">
                        <arg-restriction on-param="const-val">
                            <has-column>Seg.volume</has-column>
                        </arg-restriction>
                    </operation>
                </aftertransform>
            </selector>
        </attributemap-def>
        
        <dbrelationmap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/isPartOf"
			    to-concept="expWay">
			<selector>
                <aftertransform>
                    <operation oper-id="concat">
						<arg-restriction>
		 					<has-value>http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/expWay_<has-value>
						</arg-restriction>
						<arg-restriction>
				    		<has-column datatype="int">Seg.expWay</has-column>
						</arg-restriction>
					</operation>
                </aftertransform>
            </selector>
 		</dbrelationmap-def>
	</conceptmap-def>
<!-- ExpressWay --------------------- -->
	<conceptmap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/ExpressWay" identify-by="expWay">
		<has-table name="Seg" alias="ExpWay"/>
		
		<uri-as encodeURI="false">
			<operation oper-id="concat">
				<arg-restriction>
		 			<has-value>http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/expWay_<has-value>
				</arg-restriction>
				<arg-restriction>
				    <has-column datatype="int">ExpWay.expWay</has-column>
				</arg-restriction>
			</operation>
		</uri-as>
		
		<attributemap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/id">
			<selector>
                <aftertransform>
                    <operation oper-id="constant">
                        <arg-restriction on-param="const-val">
                            <has-column>ExpWay.expWay</has-column>
                        </arg-restriction>
                    </operation>
                </aftertransform>
            </selector>
        </attributemap-def>
	</conceptmap-def>
<!-- PositionReport --------------------- -->
	<conceptmap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/PositionReport" identify-by="PositionReport">
		<has-table name="CarSegStr" />
		
		<uri-as encodeURI="false">
			<operation oper-id="concat">
				<arg-restriction>
		 			<has-value>http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/position_<has-value>
				</arg-restriction>
				<arg-restriction>
				    <has-column datatype="int">CarSegStr.carId</has-column>
				</arg-restriction>
				<arg-restriction>
				    <has-value>_<has-value>
				</arg-restriction>
				<arg-restriction>
				    <has-column datatype="int">CarSegStr.timestamp</has-column>
				</arg-restriction>
			</operation>
		</uri-as>		
	
		<attributemap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/xPos">
			<selector>
                <aftertransform>
                    <operation oper-id="constant">
                        <arg-restriction on-param="const-val">
                            <has-column>CarSegStr.xPos</has-column>
                        </arg-restriction>
                    </operation>
                </aftertransform>
            </selector>
        </attributemap-def>
        
        <attributemap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/speed">
			<selector>
                <aftertransform>
                    <operation oper-id="constant">
                        <arg-restriction on-param="const-val">
                            <has-column>CarSegStr.xPos</has-column>
                        </arg-restriction>
                    </operation>
                </aftertransform>
            </selector>
        </attributemap-def>
	
		<dbrelationmap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/isPositionOf"
			    to-concept="car">
			<joins-via joins-type="left">	
                <condition oper-id="equals">
                    <arg-restriction on-param="value1">
                        <has-column>CarSegStr.carId</has-column>
                    </arg-restriction>
                    <arg-restriction on-param="value2">
                        <has-column>CurActiveCars.carId</has-column>
                    </arg-restriction>
                </condition>
            </joins-via>
 		</dbrelationmap-def>
 		
 		<dbrelationmap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/segment"
			    to-concept="segment">
			<joins-via joins-type="left">	
                <condition oper-id="equals">
                    <arg-restriction on-param="value1">
                        <has-column>CarSegStr.seg</has-column>
                    </arg-restriction>
                    <arg-restriction on-param="value2">
                        <has-column>Seg.seg</has-column>
                    </arg-restriction>
                </condition>
            </joins-via>
 		</dbrelationmap-def>
 		
 		<dbrelationmap-def name="http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/lane"
			    to-concept="expWay">
			<selector>
                <aftertransform>
                    <operation oper-id="concat">
						<arg-restriction>
		 					<has-value>http://ontology.oeg.dia.fi.upm.es/linearroad/lane_<has-value>
						</arg-restriction>
						<arg-restriction>
				    		<has-column datatype="int">CarSegStr.lane</has-column>
						</arg-restriction>
					</operation>
                </aftertransform>
            </selector>
 		</dbrelationmap-def>
speaker: SYSTEM
